intro: Bennettiodendron macrophyllum var. pilosum, commonly known as the pilose bennettiodendron, is a species of flowering plant in the family Malvaceae. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its large, broad leaves that are covered in fine, soft hairs, giving it a distinctive appearance.
